description: Validation rules with friendly error messages
principle: No technical jargon, no error codes, always offer help

email.friendly_error: Hmm, that doesn't look like an email address. It should have an @ and a dot, like you@example.com

stripe_key.friendly_error: This key doesn't look quite right. Stripe keys start with 'sk_live_' or 'sk_test_'. Check that you copied the whole thing.

openai_key.friendly_error: OpenAI keys start with 'sk-'. Make sure you copied the complete key from your OpenAI dashboard.
openai_key.help_link: How do I get an API key?

firebase_project_id.friendly_error: Project IDs are lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes. You can find yours in the Firebase console.
firebase_project_id.success_message: ✓ Looks like a valid project ID!

url.friendly_error: This should be a web address starting with http:// or https://

stripe.error_message: We couldn't connect to Stripe with this key. Double-check that you copied it correctly.
stripe.timeout_message: Taking longer than expected... Stripe might be slow right now. Try again?

openai.error_message: We couldn't connect to OpenAI. Make sure the key is correct and has credits available.
openai.timeout_message: OpenAI is taking a while to respond. This sometimes happens. Try again?
